newsitem.title: UK: CPL Aromas warns on year profits.
newsitem.headline: CPL Aromas warns on year profits.

text.p: CPL Aromas Plc said on Friday that results for the year ending March 31, 1997 would be impacted by the strength of sterling and the poor performance of Du Crocq.
It said in a statement that results for the year will be below market expectations.
